授業目的: Research Seminar will allow students to conduct research and analyses on themes of their own choices.
到達目標:
Through group and individual guidance and consultation with the faculty, the students will carry out research/analyses on their research theme. The first part of the Research Seminar (Spring) consists of students' presentations on their theme and discussions. Students are expected to submit a thesis draft before summer (in June) and continue working on their theses the following year. Students must submit their thesis to the instructor by the end of November. The official thesis submission must be done by December 23, 2024. Late submissions will be severely penalized. 　
日本語によるゼミ指導も行います。卒論のドラフトは春学期中に作成し、発表していただきます。卒論の完成は11月中とし、国際学部事務室への提出は12月23日が最終〆切です。計画的に卒論の作成に取りかかるように。
関連科目: Introduction to Financial Accounting, International Accounting, Financial Reporting and Analysis, Corporate Finance.
